pr_title: Fix variable interpolation with custom properties for SessionID

timeline.message: Add test for SessionSettings with custom variableValues and loading from file

timeline.bodyText: Make this private - it's not used outside this class.
timeline.author: philipwhiuk

timeline.bodyText:
As an aside, this is still a terrible name for a variable IMO but we could fix that in another commit.
To be completely obtuse, it's a variable property that contains contains variable properties.
modifiableValues would move us in the right direction. I'll take that up in another PR when this is merged.
timeline.author: philipwhiuk

timeline.bodyText: These comments are kind of unnecessary IMO.
timeline.author: philipwhiuk
